summary: The CHANGELOG for version 0.18.0 doesn't document a breaking change in client error handling where users must now catch specific errors instead of relying on gRPC error codes.
userImpact: Users upgrading to 0.18.0 may encounter unexpected errors if their code depends on gRPC error codes for error handling, with inadequate documentation of the change.
rootCause: CHANGELOG was not updated to reflect the breaking change introduced in version 0.18.0 for client error handling
resolutionDetails: Issue closed after CHANGELOG was updated to document the breaking change in error handling behavior
keyQuote: Before 0.18.0 users could rely on grpc error code for handling errors, after the change they need to catch specific errors.
